item.title: Conservative Legal Group Sues Trump Over China Tariffs
item.description: A Koch-backed conservative legal advocacy group filed a lawsuit against the Trump administration on Thursday over emergency tariffs imposed on China.

item.title: Rudy Giuliani to Newsmax: Everyone Knew Biden Was Demented
item.description: Former New York City Mayor Rudy Giuliani told Newsmax on Thursday he and many others knew about President Joe Biden's mental decline for years.
